text:
[Verse]
Morning light breaks through my window
Pour a cup to start the day
Steam rises soft and gentle
Dreams and night slip away

[Verse]
Stirring slow with sleepy eyes
Sugar grains and cream swirling here
First sip wakes the mind up
Whispers in the ear

[Chorus]
Oh coffee my dear friend
Here with me until the end
Morning's magic in a cup
With each sip we're waking up

[Verse]
Radio hums a gentle tune
Steps on hardwood floor
Morning feels like it's dancing
Greeting me once more

[Chorus]
Oh coffee my dear friend
Here with me until the end
Morning's magic in a cup
With each sip we're waking up

[Bridge]
Every day this ritual
Ground beans and water pour
Simple joys and moments
Chasing dreams once more
title: Morning Coffee
